ygData.subject: Re: Bard Revenge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... awefully ... Ah well, maybe they fixed it?  Nothing there I ever found, but as I swam along the bottom, squinting my eyes in the murk, I somehow dropped
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>I entered the lake (west commons) just enough to where I could see to the
>bottom but before it changed the colors to dark (sorta like your head is
>half-way in the water) and I didn't see anything down there. I did see some
>large piranah's but that was about it. Am I missing something? It's
awefully
>dark in there and my greater lightstone don't help much.


Ah well, maybe they fixed it? Nothing there I ever found, but as I swam
along the bottom, squinting my eyes in the murk, I somehow dropped through
the earth (although I hoped it was a future zone spot) and received a
message that I was being placed somewhere legal. Perhaps you should explore
more other waters, and find a chest which actually says it's locked some
time.

And I didn't bother with Fear after completing a long broken quest which had
a payoff of a loss of factions, gold and time. The idea of dying hard just
wouldn't save my feeling of digust with EQ at that point.

Roop
